__e: We have stolen gunpowder, pounds of it,
They are to send us black powder and more arms.
If I'd had the scientific understanding of gunpowder and primers I have today I might've been standing here.
You got some spunk left in you.
He's quite a hand-full, but a good kid. How about you, Vagn?
I knew you had some fight in you.
You came back. Do you want to get the weapons or do you want to stand here and chat?
Wouldn't be so bad if we had those four-pounders... but we run out of powder.
And who gave us the guns and powder to kill our enemies?
